item.title: Best Quotes from Neon Genesis Evangelion
item.description: Profound and thought-provoking quotes from Neon Genesis Evangelion, a captivating anime that delves into the depths of human nature. Immerse yourself in its cathartic and cultured brilliance.

item.title: Best Quotes from Naruto
item.description: Favorite Quotes from the Naruto anime. A handbook of ninja ways and motifs. Dattebayo! Gaara underrated for real!

item.title: Best Quotes from Doom
item.description: Favorite Quotes from Doom (2016) and Doom Eternal videogame. Starring the Doom Slayer, the Hell Walker, the Unchained Predator, the one who brings fear where there is no hope.

item.title: Best Quotes from Dragon Ball
item.description: Favorite Quotes from the Dragon Ball Z anime. This stuff will get you all powered up and ready to go Super Saiyan in no time.

item.title: Best Quotes from Cowboy Bebop
item.description: Favorite Quotes from the Cowboy Bebop anime. Starring the great Spike Spiegel, the suave Jet Black, and the charming Faye Valentine.

item.title: Best Quotes from Berserk (1997)
item.description: Favorite Quotes from the Berserk (1997) anime. Put your grasses on nothing will be wrong.

item.title: Best Quotes from Sin City (Graphic Novel) by Frank Miller
item.description: Discover the gritty brilliance of Sin City through its unforgettable quotes. Dive into Frank Miller's graphic novel series and embrace the dark allure.

item.title: Watchmen Review: Alan Moore's Magnum Opus
item.description: Thoughts on all of twelve issues of the Watchmen! A graphic novel that explores the complexity of superheroes and humanity.

item.title: Manga Review: BLAME! by Tsutomu Nihei
item.description: Thoughts on all six of the master edition volumes of the BLAME! manga series by Tsutomu Nihei. A dark, violent, brutal, fast-paced cyberpunk battle manga.

item.title: June 2023 Movies: Summer Cinema
item.description: June 2023 has been an exciting month for cinema enthusiasts like myself, as I indulged in a diverse selection of films across various genres.

item.description: Some of the most insane quotes from Harassment Architechture by Mika Ma, a book that has no boundries. Purely cynical.

item.title: May 2023 Movies: Blockbuster Bonanza
item.description: May brought forth an array of highly anticipated films. While my movie-watching endeavors were limited, the experiences I had were truly captivating.

item.title: A Critical Analysis of Pulp Fiction
item.description: Reviewing my favorite movie of all time - Pulp Fiction by Quentin Tarantino starring John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, Bruce Willis.

item.title: Book Review: Deadhouse Gates by Steven Erikson
item.description: Rising rebellions, ancient secrets, and an Empire on the brink of war. Deadhouse Gates is a tragic tale of war and its consequences.

item.title: Book Review: Gardens of the Moon by Steven Erikson
item.description: The Gardens of the Moon, the first volume of the Malazan Book of the Fallen, is a sprawling epic fantasy of monumental proportions.

item.title: April 2023 Movies: Spring Screenings
item.description: April 2023 was an exciting month for movie enthusiasts, with a variety of genres and eras represented in the films released and viewed.

item.title: The Best Quotes from H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: Favorite Quotes from the mind of H.P. Lovecraft. Everything from Eldritch Monsters to the Necronomicon, we have them all.

item.description: A month filled with movie magic, and I had the pleasure of watching some truly amazing films.

item.description: A perpetually growing list of youtube channels I am subscribed to. All of them are awesome.

item.description: A perpetually growing list of podcasts I am listening to. All of them are awesome. Insightful,entertaining and eye-opening.

item.description: Opening thoughts and ponderings for the Malazan Book of the Fallen series. Setting expectations for this fantasy adventure.

item.title: February 2023 Movies: Love and the Big Screen
item.description: February was a month for the ages as I indulged in a smorgasbord of movies. Consumed movies across a ton of genres.

item.title: January 2023 Movies: Toppling My Winter Watchlist
item.description: January 2023 brought a plethora of cinematic experiences my way, and I'm eager to share my take on them. From classic films to new releases, my viewing journey was diverse and exciting.

item.title: Best Quotes from First Law Trilogy
item.description: Favorite Quotes from First Law Trilogy by Joe Abercrombie. A grimdark collection that will take you to the edge of your seat.

item.description: Favorite Quotes from Nevernight Trilogy by Jay Kristoff. A blood-curdling, brutalist masterpiece.

item.title: Best Quotes from Realm of the Elderlings
item.description: Favorite Quotes from Realm of the Elderlings by Robin Hobb. All the trilogies and the charm all in one place.

item.description: A treasure trove of favorite quotes from The Witcher series by Andrzej Sapkowski. Covers all the seven books with Geralt of Rivia, Yenna, and Ciri.

item.title: Best Quotes from Watchmen (Alan Moore)
item.description: Favorite Quotes from Watchmen (Graphic Novel) by Alan Moore. Who watches the watchmen?

item.title: Best Quotes from Book of the Ancestors
item.description: Favorite Quotes from Book of the Ancestors Trilogy by Mark Lawrence. A book is as dangerous as any journey you might take.

item.title: Best Quotes from Broken Empire Trilogy
item.description: Favorite Quotes from Broken Empire Trilogy by Mark Lawrence. War, my friends, is a thing of beauty. Those as says otherwise are losing.
